meanings.definition: Laddisms: The language or behavior typical of young men characterized by boisterous, macho attitudes.
meanings.sent1: His laddisms were always loud and full of bravado.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends had their own set of laddisms they used when hanging out.
meanings.sent3: When he tried to impress the others with his laddisms, they just laughed.
meanings.sent4: His laddisms were like a shield, hiding his true feelings behind tough words.
meanings.sent5: The laddisms echoed through the room, leaving no doubt about his presence.

meanings.definition: Laddisms: Phrases or expressions commonly used by young men in a group setting.
meanings.sent1: The laddisms they shared always brought laughter to the group.
meanings.sent2: In their circle, certain laddisms were like inside jokes everyone understood.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at creating new laddisms fell flat among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The laddisms flowed between them like a secret code only they knew.
meanings.sent5: Each of his laddisms added a unique touch to their conversations.
